resources.string: Feel free to visit our website

BananaDroid is an ordinary Android Custom ROM and absolutely not better than others. We try to do what we like and may give good experience for users. Please don\'t be hesitate to report any issue on your phone to our telegram group. We can\'t promise to solve your issue but we will try to figure it out.
Customize status bar look and style
Life is colorful, don\'t be bored
Enable or disable many statusbar icons
Wake up device if charger is plugged/unplugged
Display media cover art when available
Show toggle for adaptive brightness near the slider
Spoof your device as Pixel XL for Google Photos app only to provide unlimited storage for backup
Spoof your device as different model for specific games to unlock higher FPS
Display seconds next to clock in status bar
Hide clock if launcher is visible
Number of seconds to hide clock
Number of seconds to wait before hiding clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Display clock in quick status bar header
Display date in quick status bar header
Always display battery percentage when charging
Display estimated remaining battery life when available
Display and customize current network traffic levels
Hide the traffic monitor when inactive
Duration after which speed is remeasured
Hide the network traffic indicator arrows
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
Use proper app icons for notification icons in statusbar
Display the number of pending notifications
Merge signal and signal type icons
Display roaming indicator in signal icon when in roaming mode
Display 4G icon in signal icon instead LTE
Display an indicator next to signal icon when data is disabled
Display battery status for the connected bluetooth device, if available
Display and customize battery bar above status bar
Blend full/empty colors corresponding to battery percentage
Full → empty: red ← green ← blue ← red
Full → empty: red → green → blue → red
A half press will keep the screen on only while the button is held down
A longpress and release will launch camera
Seek music tracks by long pressing the volume keys while the display is off
End the current call by pressing the power button
Answer incoming calls by pressing the volume buttons
Answer incoming calls by pressing the home button
Short click Volume Down and Power to take partial screenshot
Place the navigation bar on the left side of the screen in landscape mode
Quickly open camera without unlocking your screen
Activate the torch by long pressing the power button while the display is off
Enable on-screen navigation bar and disable hardware buttons
Swap the order of recents and back buttons
Display an alert at bottom of QS panel when network is monitored by external apps or VPN
View or change power menu entries
Show charging current, voltage, wattage and battery temperature on lockscreen while charging
Show temp with scale and image
Show temp with image without scale
Show temp with scale, image, and weather condition
Setup icon pack and weather service
You are not limited to the pre-installed weather icon packages. Search the Google PlayStore with the keyword "chronus icons" and you will find a lot of additional packages.
Show indicator when any app uses mic or camera
Show indicator when any app uses location
Show indicator when device screen is projected
Display data usage summary in quick settings footer
Display multiuser accessibility icon when available
Set transparency level for QS background
Customize tiles layout in QS panel
Show only icon for QS tiles
Enable vertical layout for QS tiles
Vibrate when fingerprint authentication is successful
Keep UDFPS enabled when the screen is off
Enable pixel style animation for 3-button navigation bar
Customize device specific ambient display settings
Wake up the device instead of pulsing notifications
Pulse notifications on removal from pocket
Duration to vibrate when pulsing notifications
Settings based on sensors are subject to hardware compatibility. Enabling sensors for ambient display may increase power drain.
Show music ticker on Ambient Display during track change
Force apps to ignore notch space
Show force stop button in the notification\'s longpress menu

Smart pixels is a power saving feature. Depending on how many pixels you decide to turn off, you could see improvement in battery life. Note that in some cases it can result in unresponsive areas on touch screen
Save battery by shutting off extra pixels
Shut off pixels to reduce power consumption
Enable Smart Pixels when battery saver is enabled
Prevents burn-in on OLED devices by shifting pixels every so often
Time to display heads up notifications
Disable heads up notifications in these applications
Disable heads up from these applications
Display popup notifications only for alarm, dialer and messaging app
Play sound and vibration for notifications when screen is on
Replace heads-up notification with slim and less invasive version of redesigned ticker
Use a reveal animation for reTicker
Replace reTicker background color using notification app main color
Replace clear all notification text with material style floating button
Pulse is a brilliant audio graphic equalizer when music plays on the device
Audio graphic equalizer for navigation bar and lockscreen
Audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar
Audio graphic equalizer on the lockscreen
Audio graphic equalizer on the ambient screen
Each bar is animated more smoothly
Extra features for immersive gaming experience
Display a custom logo on left or right of the status bar
Spoof your device as different model for Netflix
Use custom color for monet engine instead of wallpaper colors
Display an animation when the device is plugged in
Block screen and button inputs when device is in pocket
Inverts the layout of the navigation bar and other items, such as the IME switcher
When enabled, statusbar will be hidden on lockscreen
Enable combined signal icons (SystemUI will automatically restart upon toggling)
Enable about phone header on Settings dashboard
Display the app\'s icon corresponding with the toast
Set custom style for your interface
Blur media media notification artwork background
Blur amount for media notification artwork
Blur amount for lockscreen media artwork

This removes the screenshots and screenrecords limits for all applications. Normally, special applications are replaced with black areas in records. This can be convenient in some cases but may lead to privacy leaks. After changing this toggle, you may need to restart applications for the change to take effect.
When entirely silent (no ringer or vibrator)
Whether to flash when Do Not Disturb mode is active
Light up the side edges of the screen on notification pulse
Show lights for all doze events and not just notifications
Show lights on Always On Display
Hide AOD content when lights are showing
